column5: My place is perfect for your 2017 Super Bowl Getaway. New modern centrally located apartment inside the 610 Loop, with quick access to major highways. In close proximity to NRG Stadium, Midtown Houston, Downtown Houston and Hobby Airport. The apartment is about 1000 Sq ft, wood-floors, black appliances, granite counter tops in kitchen and bathroom, marble tiles in shower, and Hi speed WiFi.   The complex is gated and will serve as the perfect location to your Super Bowl Weekend!!
